physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short stature (139.5 cm), enlarged head, prominent supraorbital ridge, wide nasal bridge, flattened midface, thickened lips, macroglossia, short neck, claw hands, umbilical hernia. Chest radiography showed cardiomegaly with pulmonary edema. Echocardiography showed thickened mitral-valve leaflets, commissural fusion, and thickened subvalvular structures.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: B-type natriuretic peptide level: 2007 pg/mL; transvalvular pressure gradients: peak 47 mmHg / mean 27 mmHg; tricuspid regurgitant jet velocity: 3.9 m/s; peak pressure gradient: 63 mmHg.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal intelligence; electrocardiography showed sinus rhythm, biatrial abnormalities, and right ventricular hypertrophy. Left atrium dimension was 35 mm.
Patient in stable condition after mitral valve replacement and under enzyme replacement therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient has been stable during follow-up.
